### Crash Course Statistics
This week we have two videos from Crash Course Statistics. The first is one on **Experimental Designs** which may benefit many of you after the conclusion of this course.

The second is on **Sampling** which focuses more on the chapter elements. Sampling is one of the most important aspects of any quantitative study. If you underestimate a sample (aka undersample), then a whole study can become useless. If you overestimate a sample (aka oversample), then you'll be doing a bunch of extra work for no reason.
